name: pm5.21im

body.origin:
|- wi(wn(w0), wi(wn(w1), wb(w0, w1)))
-| wi(wn(w0), wb(wn(w1), wb(w0, w1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wn(w0), wi(wn(w1), wb(w0, w1)))
-| wi(wn(w0), wb(wn(w1), wb(w0, w1)))

comment: Two propositions are equivalent if they are both false. Closed form of ~ 2false . Equivalent to a ~ biimpr -like version of the xor-connective. (Contributed by Wolf Lammen, 13-May-2013.)
